price: Na hwε na woanka amfa biribi ho sε: “Mεyε saa adeε no ͻkyena;
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
